title: Gnome Cunning
content:
You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

How to unlock Gnome Cunning

Gnome Cunning can be acquired by all three subraces of Gnome:

Deep Gnome Forest Gnome Rock Gnome

Gnome Cunning Tips & Notes

The advantage you get is for the saving throws to resist enemy spells, meaning you get to roll two dice and use the highest one. Other Notes & Tips go here.

All Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Nature ♦ Action Surge ♦
